text: KYYZ (96.1 FM) is a radio station licensed to Williston, North Dakota. It broadcasts a country music format. The station was first licensed as KLAN on April 1, 1980. It also has two sister stations, KEYZ and KTHC. All three stations are owned by Cherry Creek Radio of Denver, Colorado, and are located at 410 6th Street East, on Williston's east side. ==References== ==External links== * * YYZ Category:Williston, North Dakota Category:Radio stations established in 1980 Category:1980 establishments in North Dakota
title: KYYZ
